articles.title: Mainland 'Pretend Work Companies' Offer Daily Workspace Rentals for 30 Yuan
articles.author: The Standard 英文虎報
articles.summary: Pop Mart is launching mini Labubu this week. The company expects its revenue to surpass 30 billion yuan this year.

articles.title: I Still Love the Look of Google's New Pixel 10 Pro and Pro XL
articles.author: Andrew Lanxon
articles.summary: Google is launching the Pixel 10 Pro and 10 Pro XL, its newest flagship phones. The phones include a Tensor G5 processor, faster charging, and AI tools.

articles.title: 微软为Xbox应用引入掌机友好型新功能：整合第三方应用与游戏平台_手机网易网
articles.author: IT之家
org: IT之家了解，微软目前仅开放了少量精选应用，未来还会逐步扩展支持范围。去年，微软曾表示要让
articles.summary: Microsoft is introducing a new feature called 'My Apps' to the Xbox app for PC, allowing players to directly install and launch third-party applications and game stores like Steam and Ubisoft Connect. This new tab is designed to improve user experience, especially for handheld devices like ROG Ally, by centralizing game applications in one place and simplifying the process of switching between apps.

articles.title: Bank NXT Launches ‘Private' Segment to Provide Exclusive Banking and Non-Banking Services for High-Net-Worth Clients
articles.summary: Bank NXT has launched its new 'Private' segment, a service package targeting high-net-worth clients with a minimum balance of EGP 20 million. The segment offers exclusive financial solutions, banking and non-banking services, a dedicated Relationship Manager, private lounges, and an Infinite Credit Card with a limit up to EGP 1 million, alongside lifestyle benefits like legal advisory, healthcare privileges and travel perks.

articles.title: This Shark Cordless Vacuum Is ‘Superior' to Dyson, and It's on Sale
articles.author: Maggie Horton
articles.summary: Shark has introduced the Vertex Ultra Cordless Stick Vacuum, featuring powerful suction, dual brushrolls, and a 60-minute runtime. The vacuum easily converts to a handheld model with specialized tools. Amazon also has cordless vacuum deals from Tikom, Bissell, and Shark.

articles.title: Emergent Brings Salesforce and Agentforce Solutions to Federal Agencies Through GSA Contract Vehicle Access
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Emergent, LLC has added Salesforce solutions and services to its GSA Contract, effective August 7, 2025. Federal agencies can now procure Salesforce technology, including Agentforce, through Emergent's team. Salesforce introduced Emergent as their newest Public Sector partner in February 2025.

articles.title: 'Entrepreneurship Essentials Unveils Innovative Program to Foster Future Business Leaders
articles.author: pressadvantage
articles.summary: Entrepreneurship Essentials has launched a new program focused on nurturing entrepreneurial skills, led by Dr. Greg Watson. The program includes market analysis, financial planning, product development, and branding, using real-world case studies and interactive workshops. Networking opportunities and access to a global innovation network are also provided.

articles.title: Dynadot Launches NameClub: A New Premium Domain Marketplace
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Dynadot, an ICANN-accredited domain registrar, has launched NameClub, a new domain aftermarket platform. NameClub aims to connect businesses, entrepreneurs, and investors with premium, brandable domain names, offering a streamlined platform for both domain buyers and sellers across various industries.

articles.title: ★★ Only $0.8 1st month★★ Unlimited domains and bandwidth▓▓ ♕♕Pure SSD♕♕ [Servikus]
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: A company (unnamed) is offering 'PURE SSD hosting' services, emphasizing the importance of website loading speed. They claim 40% of users abandon sites loading in over 3 seconds and invite users to try their services.

articles.title: 'Why should I give Google money?' – former Nest fans decry new leaked model, and I really can't blame them
articles.summary: Google previewed a new Nest smart speaker. The device's features and consumer demand are currently unknown.

articles.title: Nissan Just Unveiled a New Nismo Model That Needs to Make Its Way to the U.S.
articles.author: Gray Van Dyke
articles.summary: Nissan has launched the X-Trail Nismo model, a JDM twin to the Rogue, featuring Kayaba Swing Valve shock absorbers for enhanced handling and ride comfort. This crossover aims to appeal to driving enthusiasts and may potentially be available in the United States.

articles.title: Google: Trying to persuade the advantages of artificial intelligence
articles.summary: Google is promoting its new Pixel series smartphones, which feature artificial intelligence capabilities, to attract public interest. This promotional push aims to overcome the challenge of competing with established players like Apple in the smartphone market.

articles.title: Neck Wrinkles Getting you Down? Try This New Skincare Routine That'll Fix You Right Up
articles.summary: Dekliderm is a product aimed at addressing tech neck and neck wrinkles.

articles.title: FreshDirect, Utopia Bagels mark summer's end with pop-up event
articles.author: Long Island Business News
articles.summary: FreshDirect and Utopia Bagels are collaborating for a pop-up event in Southampton on August 28th. The event will feature lobster, bagels, and farm-fresh local ingredients to celebrate the end of summer.

articles.title: Wall Street closes down as investors brace for Powell's speech
articles.author: MARKET
articles.summary: Pop Mart will launch mini Labubu this week. The company expects revenue to hit over 30 bln yuan this year.

articles.title: T-Mobile will give you 4 free Google Pixel phones right now - how the deal works
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: T-Mobile is offering an enticing upgrade deal for both new and existing customers with eligible plans and trade-ins to upgrade to the new Google Pixel 10.

articles.title: Mivi AI Buds Review: Work in progress
articles.author: Sourabh Kulesh
articles.summary: Mivi has launched the Mivi AI Buds, featuring built-in AI Avatars and a bean-shaped design. The earbuds are currently available for Rs 3,999 and sport 13mm bass drivers, Hi-Res Audio, LDAC, 3D Soundstage, Spatial Audio and ANC.

articles.title: Xayn Promises User-First Privacy In Its Search Alternative
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Xayn aims to introduce a more secure search service. This search offers algorithmic features and focuses on user experience.

articles.title: Google bets on AI with Pixel 10 launch
articles.summary: Google unveiled its 10th-generation phone. The phone features some of the latest AI features. Google hopes to capitalize on its rivals' shortcomings in the smartphone market.

articles.title: 5 ChatGPT Prompts To Help You Improve Your Digital Marketing
articles.author: Richard D. Harroch
articles.summary: ChatGPT assists in digital marketing by generating creative content for new product launches and service promotions. For example, it can craft Instagram captions for sustainable fashion brands, write email marketing campaigns for eco-friendly products, and develop SEO-driven blog posts. It can also be used to write google ad copy for cloud-based project management tool targeting startups.

articles.title: Rotimatic launches next-gen AI-powered roti maker in India
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Rotimatic has launched its next-generation model, Rotimatic NEXT, in India. The appliance, which makes fresh rotis using robotics and AI, will be available through the company's website. The company's manufacturing unit has been shifted to the Bengaluru–Mysuru region to cater to both global and Indian markets.

articles.title: Sandy Alcantara Reminds The St. Louis Cardinals Of What They Traded Away
articles.summary: WeAreIowa launched its WeAreIowa app. The app enables users to stream WeAreIowa content on their phones, offering a new service to its viewers.

articles.title: Starbucks coconut water drinks being tested in one Iowa city. Where to find them.
articles.author: Des Moines Register
articles.summary: Starbucks has launched its 'Green Apron Service' initiative nationwide across 11,000 stores. The aim of this initiative is to improve speed, personalization, and hospitality for customers.

articles.title: Emergent Brings Salesforce and Agentforce Solutions to Federal Agencies Through GSA Contract Vehicle Access
articles.author: Emergent
articles.summary: Emergent, LLC has added Salesforce solutions and services to its active GSA Contract, effective August 7, 2025. Federal agencies can now procure Salesforce technology solutions, including Agentforce, through Emergent's team.

articles.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know
articles.author: Tiago Ventura
articles.summary: OpenAI created ChatGPT, a conversational AI chatbot that understands and generates human-like text. It's accessible via website, mobile app, and integrations. Users can opt for a free, limited version or upgrade to GPT Plus or GPT Team.

articles.title: Robots From The Matrix: The NVIDIA Simulation is Real
articles.author: Kevin Cook
articles.summary: NVIDIA is launching the next-generation Jetson Thor platform, designed for physical AI and humanoid robotics. This platform supports AI frameworks and generative AI models and is compatible with NVIDIA's software stack. The company is also showcasing innovations from partners in robotics industries, indicating a strong push in robotics and AI advancements.

articles.title: Robots From The Matrix: The NVIDIA Simulation is Real
articles.summary: NVIDIA is planning a special product announcement, detailing the next-generation NVIDIA Jetson Thor platform. This platform is designed for physical AI and humanoid robotics, supporting various AI frameworks and generative AI models. It integrates with NVIDIA's software stack, encompassing NVIDIA Isaac, Isaac GR00T, NVIDIA Metropolis, and NVIDIA Holoscan.

articles.title: Every Pixel device announced at Made by Google yesterday: 10 Pro Fold, Watch, Buds, more
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Google introduced its latest lineup of products this week. These include new phones, smartwatches, and earbuds, showcasing the company's continuous innovation in consumer electronics.

articles.title: Meta Adds More AI-Powered Ad Options for Your Holiday Planning
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Meta is launching new ad tools and features to enhance marketing campaigns for the holiday season.  These updates include improved ways for brands to collaborate with creators, enhancements to ad formats with 'show products' optimization and creator testimonials, and expanded access to features like omnichannel ads and email sign-up offers. These aim to drive better results and increased conversions for advertisers on Facebook and Instagram.

articles.title: Google's Pixel 10 phone raises the ante on artificial intelligence
articles.author: The Los Angeles Times
articles.summary: Google launched a new line of Pixel smartphones. These smartphones feature artificial intelligence. The AI is designed to retrieve vital information and improve photo quality.

articles.title: 4 Things New YoWhatsapp Has That Your Official WhatsApp Does Not Have
articles.author: Tech Moran
articles.summary: YoWhatsapp developers introduced new features absent in the official WhatsApp application. This updated version of the application has gained popularity.

articles.title: Rokid Sets Stage for AI Glasses Launch in New York
articles.summary: Rokid will launch Rokid Glasses, described as the world's lightest full-function AI & AR smart glasses, at an event titled "Future in Sight" on August 26, 2025, in New York City. Rokid aims to expand its reach beyond the domestic market by establishing a network of over 1,000 overseas developers.

articles.title: AI is finally getting better at knowing what people want. Why this matters for consumers and the brands trying to reach them
articles.author: RTB House
articles.summary: RTB House introduced IntentGPT, an AI component that uses large language models and Deep Learning to interpret user intent and match it with relevant products from advertiser catalogs. This has resulted in a 44% increase in engagement rates. The system analyzes the semantic meaning of web content and user intent in real-time, connecting intent with appropriate product recommendations, offering more relevant ads to consumers.

articles.title: Nokia Reveals Transparent Smartphone with High-End Camera and Battery
articles.author: Africa
articles.summary: Nokia launched a new smartphone in India featuring a transparent design and high-performance specifications. The device boasts a 300-megapixel camera, a 7000mAh battery with 150-watt fast charging, and a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor. Available in black and silver transparent options, the phone is priced at ₹109,999 and will be sold through Nokia's channels and major retailers.

articles.title: Rotimatic launches next-gen AI-powered roti maker in India
articles.summary: Rotimatic has launched its next-generation model, Rotimatic NEXT, in India. Rotimatic NEXT is a smart kitchen appliance that uses robotics and AI to make fresh rotis and will be available directly to consumers through the company's website.

articles.title: We Saw the Pixel 10 and Pixel 10 Pro, and Here's What Stands Out
articles.author: Michelle Ehrhardt
articles.summary: Google introduces the Pixel 10 and Pixel 10 Pro XL, featuring upgrades like a new camera lens, an upgraded chip, and MagSafe-like charging. The Pixel 10 Pro XL starts at 256GB and is more expensive than the previous year's model. The phone retains a similar design to the Pixel 9 but includes internal improvements.

articles.title: The 8 Best Hair-Thickening Shampoos for Men
articles.author: Adam Hurly
articles.summary: Patricks introduced SH Plus Ultra-Thickening Shampoo with Baicapil, Capixyl, Redensyl, and Procapil for hair density and strength. Dr. Groot launched a shampoo with Biotin, Prebiotics, Rosemary Oil, and Caffeine for scalp health and hair volume. Olaplex introduced No. 4 Fine Bond Maintenance Shampoo with Bis-aminopropyl diglycol dimaleate for bond repair, designed for fine hair.

articles.title: Not your average diaper bag: How Nikki Day founded Ayla & Co
articles.author: Ashley Zlatopolsky
articles.summary: Ayla & Co launched its first product, the Ayla Diaper Bag and Ayla Vacuum bundle, in September 2020. The Ayla Diaper Bag features a minimal vegan leather design and organized compartments, while the Ayla Vacuum is a compact, cordless system designed to fit in the diaper bag. Ayla & Co has since expanded its product line to include tote bags, travel bags, and luggage.

articles.title: Google set a new durability standard with the Pixel 10 Fold (Samsung: take note)
articles.author: Kerry Wan
articles.summary: Google's Pixel 10 Fold is setting a new durability standard. The foldable phone is the first of its kind to earn an IP68 rating for improved dust resistance.

articles.title: The never-nude smartphone.
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: HMD has launched the Fuse, a new smartphone featuring 'system-level' AI parental controls. These controls block nudity from any app, including the camera. The product is initially available in the UK, with a planned rollout to other countries.

articles.title: Tech Report: Google unveils Pixel 10, Hertz cars on Amazon, Sony hikes PS5 price
articles.author: Keenan Gibson
articles.summary: Google introduced its Pixel 10 smartphone lineup, emphasizing AI features. Hertz is now collaborating with Amazon to offer pre-owned vehicles online, initially within 75 miles of Dallas, Houston, Los Angeles, and Seattle. Sony increased the price of the PlayStation 5 by $50 in the U.S.

articles.title: Tailor Brands Unveils MCP Beta, Unlocking Embedded Legal and Business Building Capabilities for AI Products Serving SMBs
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Tailor Brands launched its Model Context Protocol (MCP) Beta, designed for agentic platforms, conversational products, and AI assistants serving small businesses. The MCP allows selected partners to embed legal and business-building services directly into their AI workflows, such as LLC formation and EIN registration. The MCP is free, and partners pay only when end-users trigger regulated services.

articles.title: Google's AI mode lands in MENA: Here's what users can expect
articles.author: Nida Sohail
articles.summary: Google has launched 'AI Mode,' its most advanced AI-powered search experience, in the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) region.  Built on a custom version of Google's Gemini 2.5 model, AI Mode offers multimodal input, advanced reasoning, and follow-up questioning to tackle complex queries. The feature is available as a dedicated tab on Google Search and within the Google app.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 series: Price in India compared to the Australia, Japan, UK and other countries
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: The Pixel 10 series has been launched and is now available.

articles.title: Tecno launches Spark Go 2S in South Africa
articles.summary: Tecno launched the Spark Go 2S smartphone in South Africa. The device is available at TFG stores for ZAR 1,399. Other Tecno devices are also available at select retail partners.

articles.title: 20 Cool TikTok Finds Worth Scrolling For
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder, a low-maintenance option for makeup minimalists who want a matte, yet still radiant, complexion. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash which is packed with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides to make the skin feel nourished. Catrice released 'Instant Awake' Under Eye Brightener to conceal and brighten dark circles.

articles.title: Cracker Barrel's new logo causes controversy; pop-up store in NYC Thursday
articles.author: John Asbury
articles.summary: Cracker Barrel launched a pop-up restaurant in Manhattan to offer a "Taste of Country, Anytime" experience. The event features its fall and signature menu, along with entertainment and classic Cracker Barrel games. This brings the brand's country hospitality to New York, offering a taste of its menu to Long Islanders yearning for a store in their area.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10, new Pro Fold launched: Here's all you need to know
articles.summary: Google unveiled four new Pixel smartphones. This launch event highlights the company's increased emphasis on artificial intelligence and user experience.

articles.title: Burger King Launching New Whopper—With a Twist
articles.author: Ben Kelly
articles.summary: Burger King launched the Crispy Onion Whopper on August 26th, a new menu item created through its "Whopper by You" platform. This limited-time offering is a twist on the classic Whopper and will be available in full and Jr. sizes.

articles.title: Lush's Halloween advent calendar launches with 7 different spooky bath favourites inside
articles.author: Faith Richardson
articles.summary: Lush has launched its new Countdown to Halloween Advent Calendar, priced at £55. The calendar includes seven full-size bathtime favorites like bath bombs, bubble bars, shower gels, and solid hand cream. The products have autumnal vibe such as Pumpkin Spice Latte shower gel.

articles.title: Primech AI Unveils the All-New HYTRON: Next-Generation AI-Powered Autonomous Bathroom Cleaning ...
articles.author: Primech Holdings Ltd.
articles.summary: Primech AI, a subsidiary of Primech Holdings Limited, has launched the next-generation HYTRON autonomous bathroom cleaning robot. This model boasts design enhancements and advanced AI capabilities, and it is available in matte black and metallic silver finishes.

articles.title: 33 Things That'll Help You Realize The Handyman Has Been Living In Your House All Along (Psst, It's *You*)
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article introduces several new and useful products for home improvement and cleaning. These include NoNo Brackets for hanging curtains, special brush for cleaning dryer's lint trap, dishwasher-cleaning tablets, oil stain remover, foaming garbage disposal cleaner, jetted tub cleaner, SnapPower GuideLight to optimize your regular old outlets, a set of Snug Plugs for hair dryer plug, washing machine-descaling tablets or citrus-y Oh Yuk washing machine cleaner, The Pink Stuff Spray, carpet cleaning solution, stain-lifting pads, a standing weeder, crack weeder tool, interlocking teak tiles, Luigi's Sink and Drain Plunger, Green Gobbler Drain Clog Dissolver, solar lights, roll of perma-mulch, bleach-free outdoor cleaner or concrete paint, six-outlet wall charger, expandable under-sink kit, carpet cleaner, rechargeable, stick-on LED wall light, renter-friendly Tulip shade, Angry Orange pet odor eliminator, roll of wood grain tape, pre-made wall panels, wireless library light, cabinet pulls, and grout pen. These products aim to solve common household problems.

articles.title: Nalgene Bottles Just Got Lit: Introducing the 'GloWyld' Glow-in-the-Dark Collection
articles.summary: Nalgene Outdoor launched its GloWyld collection, which includes five new glow-in-the-dark water bottle designs inspired by nature. These 32-oz bottles are made with 50% plastic waste and are available nationwide for $18.99.

articles.title: Argos beats Amazon's 'lowest ever price' for colour Kindle with double discount
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Argos is offering discounts on the Amazon Kindle Colorsoft Signature Edition and Amazon Kindle Paperwhite 2024 16GB. The Kindle Colorsoft features a color screen, a 7-inch display, and an eight-week battery life. Customers have generally provided positive reviews, praising its comfort, battery life, and suitability for reading books and comics.

articles.title: Future Samsung Galaxy phones could ditch apps for a whole new experience, reveals company exec
articles.summary: Samsung's Mobile Gaming Hub, previously available in the US, now includes cloud gaming in the UK and Germany. This service allows Galaxy phone owners to play games without downloading them, utilizing cloud streaming technology. Samsung envisions expanding this cloud technology beyond gaming to other app types, potentially leading to an app-less experience on devices.

articles.title: 43 Things For Anyone Who Is Lazy But Wants To Live Well
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Bruvi launched a new coffee maker and starter set that allows users to make hot coffee or tea at the press of a button.

articles.title: Dr Sam's Flawless Moisturiser Intense: award-winning barrier repair cream customers can't stop raving about
articles.author: The Scotsman
articles.summary: Customers are expressing positive feedback for Dr Sam's Flawless Moisturiser Intense cream, indicating satisfaction with the product.

articles.title: Cobalt Recognized for Third Consecutive Year in the Gartner® Hype Cycle® for Application Security, 2025, Hype Cycle for Security Operations, 2025, and Hype Cycle for XaaS, 2025 Reports
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Cobalt has been recognized as a Sample Vendor in three 2025 Gartner Hype Cycle reports for its Penetration Testing as a Service (PTaaS). PTaaS is a technology-led application and infrastructure testing service delivered through a SaaS platform, which combines automation and human pentesters to enhance efficiency.

articles.title: Huawei Set to Unveil New Wearables, Tablets, and Phones in Paris on September 19
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Huawei will host an Innovative Product launch on September 19 in Paris, France. The event will focus on the unveiling of a brand-new HUAWEI product.

articles.title: Official Look at the New Balance ABZORB 2000 'Blue Ice/Grey'
articles.summary: New Balance is releasing the ABZORB 2000 'Blue Ice/Grey' colorway, featuring a mixed-material upper with icy blue and light grey accents. The shoe includes a full-length ABZORB sole for enhanced cushioning and will be available on New Balance's website and select retailers. The expected release is in Fall 2025 at a retail price of $170 USD.

articles.title: The Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold Is The First Foldable I'd Actually Recommend
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Google introduced the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, a foldable phone featuring a new gearless hinge, larger outer display, and IP68 water and dust resistance. The phone has the same protection as the other Pixel 10 phones.

articles.title: The Best Chemical Exfoliants We Tested: Toners, Night Creams, Cleansers, and More
articles.author: Jamie Allison Sanders
articles.summary: Several companies including Caudalie, First Aid Beauty, Kate Somerville, No7 Beauty, Paula's Choice, SkinCeuticals, U Beauty, PanOxyl, The Inkey List, and The Ordinary have chemical exfoliant products. Caudalie's Vinoperfect Brightening Glycolic Night Cream aims to reduce dark spots, while First Aid Beauty's Facial Radiance Pads are designed for sensitive skin to improve radiance. Kate Somerville's Liquid ExfoliKate helps dissolve buildup, No7 Laboratories Resurfacing Peel uses glycolic acid, and Paula's Choice offers both a BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant and an Azelaic Acid Booster. SkinCeuticals' Glycolic Renewal Gel Cleanser targets dullness, and U Beauty's The Resurfacing Compound improves texture. Budget-friendly options include PanOxyl Clarifying Exfoliant, The Inkey List Glycolic Acid Toner, and The Ordinary Glycolic Acid 7% Exfoliating Toner.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Launch: Artificial Intelligence Promises Remain Overshadowed by the Glitter of the Event
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 10 featuring the new Tensor G4 chip, a redesigned chassis, and upgrades to AI capabilities like Magic Eraser Pro and Enhanced Google Assistant. The Pixel 10 boasts a new 50MP main sensor for improved image quality and offers manual controls for advanced photographers along with cinematic blur effect.

articles.title: Pixel 10 Years & New AI: Google's Future 📱✨
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 10 range, including the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, featuring the Tensor G5 chip and Gemini Nano for enhanced AI capabilities. They also introduced Gemini for Home, replacing Google Assistant, to provide a more intuitive and proactive smart home experience. These new products aim to create a seamless, integrated ecosystem powered by AI.

articles.title: I tried eco-friendly powder shampoo that costs just 29p per wash — one thing surprised me
articles.author: Sophie Bates
articles.summary: The Powder Shampoo launched a 0% water, eco-conscious powder shampoo and conditioner. Each bottle contains 70 washes and costs £20 for shampoo or £25 for conditioner as a one-off purchase. The brand emphasizes sustainable packaging and water conservation.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney Is Being Called Out For How 'Male Centered' She Is After She Blamed Women For The Negative Reaction To Her Bathwater Soap
articles.author: Stephanie Soteriou
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch, in collaboration with Sydney Sweeney, launched 'Sydney's Bathwater Bliss,' a soap infused with traces of her bathwater. Sweeney confirmed she pitched the idea for the soap. The product launch generated controversy, with criticism focused on the capitalization of misogyny.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney Called Out, Bathwater Soap Reaction
articles.author: Stephanie Soteriou
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch collaborated with Sydney Sweeney to launch 'Sydney's Bathwater Bliss,' a soap infused with her bathwater. Sydney Sweeney pitched the idea of the soap and aimed to encourage people to use natural personal care products. The product launch generated controversy and public reaction.

articles.title: Best AI Ad Generators That Help You Launch Campaigns in Minutes
articles.author: Created by
articles.summary: Invideo AI allows businesses to create studio-quality UGC ads without filming or editing skills using AI-powered video generation. Pictory repurposes long-form content into short-form video adverts using AI to identify key highlights. Synthesia transforms text scripts into explainer videos using AI avatars for multilingual campaigns. DeepBrain streamlines tutorial video creation by transforming written guides into visual walk-throughs with digital avatars. HeyGen is a localization tool that adapts video content for diverse audiences by switching languages and avatars.

articles.title: ChatGPT isn't too happy with Google Pixel 10 5G mobile pricing: It may still lag ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Google unveiled the Pixel 10 series, an AI-powered smartphone. The series boasts meaningful upgrades in cameras, hardware, and artificial intelligence features, focusing on practical applications for productivity, calls, and photography.

articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo leads launch as Al Nassr drop dazzling new 2025/26 home kit
articles.author: 90min
articles.summary: Al Nassr unveiled their 2025/26 Adidas home kit featuring a Riyadh-inspired design. The launch prominently features Cristiano Ronaldo.

articles.title: What is Dr Sam's Flawless Moisturiser Intense?
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Dr Sam's launched Flawless Moisturiser Intense, a barrier repair cream designed for sensitive and redness-prone skin. This moisturizer is praised for its ability to transform skin while remaining lightweight and non-comedogenic. Users apply it after cleansing, adjusting the amount based on skin type, and can pair it with retinoid treatments.

articles.title: Dr Sam's Flawless Moisturiser Intense: award-winning barrier repair cream customers can't stop raving about
articles.author: Natalie Dixon
articles.summary: Dr Sam's introduced Flawless Moisturiser Intense, a barrier repair cream for sensitive skin priced at £63. SmilePro launched Advanced Whitening Kit with dual LED light tech for home teeth whitening, now available at a discounted price with 30-day guarantee.

articles.title: Top-secret unreleased Google gadget that ISN'T public yet spotted in Lando Norris video by eagle-eyed fans
articles.author: Sean Keach
articles.summary: Google is speculated to be launching a new Google Nest Mini smart speaker, potentially as an update to older Nest devices. This comes after a mystery speaker device was spotted in a promo video for the new Google Pixel 10 phone launch and features the use of the Google Gemini Live chatbot. The new speaker is expected to have a white body, a light ring, and will feature the Gemini for Home voice assistant which is expected to replace the old Google Assistant.

articles.title: 21 Products That Reviewers Are Glad They Finally Own
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The content presents a diverse array of products designed to improve daily life, ranging from pet care solutions like the microchip pet feeder and Bissell Little Green machine, to beauty and personal care items such as Olaplex No. 3 and Laneige overnight lip mask. Additionally, it introduces household gadgets like the magnetic shelf and fabric defuzzer, targeting specific needs with innovative solutions.

articles.title: TangibleFuture's AI Desktop Robot LOOI to Launch New "Starlight White" on Aug. 21
articles.summary: TangibleFuture has launched a new color variant, "Starlight White," for its AI desktop robot, LOOI. This new version builds upon the success of the black edition and introduces a bold design aimed at enhancing user experience through technology and personal expression. Since its initial launch in 2024, LOOI has gained recognition, including attention at CES 2025 where it was named one of the coolest products.

articles.title: Would you like to live deliciously? Here's where you can get 'Opaque' ice cream in Athens
articles.author: Athens Banner-Herald
articles.summary: Jeni's Splendid Ice Creams collaborated with visual artist Cj Hendry. They created Opaque, a special ice cream flavor. Jeni's launched the Opaque flavor on Thursday, Aug. 14.

articles.title: Home Bargains reduces ‘holy grail' skin care to £1.49
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Clearasil Daily Gentle Gel Wash, an acne treatment containing salicylic acid, is available at Home Bargains for £1.49, a 77% discount from its usual price of £6.50. The product has received positive reviews from some Superdrug shoppers, who describe it as a "holy grail" for acne-prone skin, while others with sensitive skin have reported negative reactions.

articles.title: TangibleFuture's AI Desktop Robot LOOI to Launch New "Starlight White" on Aug. 21
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: TangibleFuture is launching a new 'Starlight White' color variant of its LOOI AI desktop robot. This new version builds on the success of the black edition and offers a bold design integrating technology and personal expression. The LOOI robot is known for its scene perception capabilities and has gained recognition since its initial launch in 2024.

articles.title: This Gen Zer washed his college basketball team's dirty clothes and mopped floors for a year—they laughed but now he's one of the youngest interns ever at the NBA
articles.author: Orianna Rosa Royle
articles.summary: Daniel Sung, after gaining experience with the LA Clippers, now works with two startups. He helped launch a new cohort program at a job-application platform with an AI focus. Later this year, he will also take on a marketing role with Red Bull.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 smartphones: All you need to know
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 10 series at the Made by Google event on August 20, 2025. The new phones are AI-powered, feature camera improvements, use the Google Tensor G5 chip for enhanced AI processing, and integrate the new Qi2 wireless charging feature with 'PixelSnap.' The Pixel 10 series will receive seven years of OS and security updates.

articles.title: Anthropic AI Releases Claude Code for Team and Enterprise Plans Allowing Users To Streamline Workflows and Delegate Tasks to AI Coding Assistant
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Anthropic AI has launched Claude Code, an AI coding assistant, for Team and Enterprise users. Vivo is launching Vivo T4 Pro 5G smartphone on August 26, 2025.

articles.title: Yatsen Announces Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Yatsen Holding Limited reported its second-quarter 2025 financial results, with key products like Galénic's Brightening Micro Mask, DR.WU's Purifying Renewal Essence Toner, and Perfect Diary's Translucent Blurring Setting Powder contributing to the company's growth. The company's strategy focuses on delivering high-quality products and building strong brand equity, fueled by enhanced R&D capabilities.

articles.title: Renault Teases All-New Kiger: What To Expect?
articles.author: Before Content
articles.summary: Renault has teased a completely redesigned Renault Kiger, signaling a significant update to its compact SUV. The new Kiger is expected to feature a sportier design, upgraded interiors, new tech features, and potentially improved performance, aiming to enhance its position in the compact SUV market against competitors like Tata Punch and Maruti Suzuki Fronx.

articles.title: Hong Kong's inflation records a modest 1 percent gain in July
articles.author: MARKET
articles.summary: Pop Mart is launching 'mini Labubu' this week. The company expects its revenue to exceed 30 billion yuan this year.

articles.title: LG Electronics Launches Fourth Free Wash Centre In Benin City
articles.author: OLUSHOLA BELLO
articles.summary: LG Electronics has launched a new free laundry center with the capacity to wash and dry approximately 500 sets of clothes. This initiative represents the company's effort to provide a state-of-the-art hygienic service to the community.

articles.title: Just Eat trials first physical-AI delivery 'robo-dogs' in Europe
articles.author: Grocery Gazette
articles.summary: Just Eat Takeaway.com is trialling a new generation of delivery robots featuring 'physical AI', marking a European first. This initiative is a partnership with Swiss robotics.

articles.title: TVS Ntorq 150 debut on September 1: What to expect from the new scooter
articles.author: HT Auto Desk
articles.summary: TVS Motor is set to launch the Ntorq 150 on September 1, expanding its scooter lineup to the 150cc segment. The Ntorq 150 is expected to feature sharper design elements, potentially including LED lighting with quad-projectors, and is expected to produce close to 12 bhp. Key features are anticipated such as 14-inch wheels, a rear disc brake, and TVS's SmartXonnect system with a TFT screen, positioning it against rivals like Yamaha Aerox 155 and Aprilia SR 160.

articles.title: L&T Technology Services Launches PLxAI, Proprietary GenAI Framework to Accelerate Product Development
articles.summary: L&T Technology Services has launched PLxAI, a GenAI-based framework designed to accelerate the Product Development Life Cycle for its global clients. PLxAI combines Generative AI & Conventional AI to provide scalable and reusable solutions across all PDLC stages from concept design to aftermarket services support, and has already seen deployments across multiple domains.

articles.title: L&T Technology Services Launches PLxAI, Proprietary GenAI Framework to Accelerate Product Development
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: L&T Technology Services has launched PLxAI, a proprietary GenAI-based framework. This framework aims to accelerate the Product Development Life Cycle for its global clients in Mobility, Sustainability, and Tech by using Generative AI & Conventional AI.

articles.title: City to get fluffier with arrival of viral pancake brand
articles.author: Lynette Pinchess Life writer
articles.summary: Fluffy Fluffy, a Japanese pancake brand, is opening its 18th UK store in Nottingham. The cafe will offer soufflé pancakes with various flavors, along with croffles, sandos, a savoury brunch menu, Perfect Ted Matcha, coffees, and smoothies. The brand, which launched in Toronto in 2018, plans to open 30 more sites in the future.

articles.title: Battery maker Shuangdeng's IPO over 3,000 times oversubscribed
articles.author: MARKET
articles.summary: Pop Mart will launch the 'mini Labubu' product this week. The company anticipates exceeding 30 billion yuan in revenue this year.

articles.title: Lynk & Co PH inaugurates flagship dealer on North EDSA
articles.summary: Lynk & Co Philippines has opened its flagship facility and unveiled the new Lynk & Co 08 EM-P at the dealership opening. The Lynk & Co 08 EM-P is available for pre-order at North EDSA and other dealers, offering a robust and powerful hybrid experience.

articles.title: Hengan reports 2.6pc drop in profit to 1.37b yuan amid fierce price competition
articles.author: MARKET
articles.summary: Pop Mart is launching mini Labubu this week. The company expects revenue to reach over 30 billion yuan this year.

articles.title: Top 10 best vacuum cleaners deals on Amazon with up to 86% off on robotic, wet and dry and handheld vacuum cleaners
articles.author: Kanika Budhiraja
articles.summary: Several vacuum cleaner models are being introduced from companies such as Dreame, Bissell, Philips, and ILIFE. The Dreame D10 Plus offers powerful suction and LiDAR navigation while Bissell Little Green Multi-Purpose Portable Carpet and Upholstery Cleaner tackles stains and pet messes effortlessly. ILIFE T20s Self-Emptying Robotic Vacuum Cleaner has Advanced LDS Navigation, 5000Pa Strong Suction.

articles.title: M&S's beauty advent calendar is worth over £300 — this is when it launches
articles.author: Daisy Lester
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer (M&S) will launch its 2025 beauty advent calendar on October 9, 2025, both online and in-store. The calendar is priced at £60 and includes 25 beauty products from brands like Clinique, Estée Lauder, and Benefit, with packaging designed by Bella Freud. The calendar contains eight full-size and 17 travel-size products, with a total value exceeding £300.

articles.title: Anthropic offering Claude-Code in enterprise plan: How it helps businesses
articles.summary: Anthropic is launching a new subscription plan that bundles Claude Code into Claude for Enterprise. This offering provides businesses with granular spending controls, enhanced flexibility for integrating Claude Code with the Claude.ai chatbot, and allows for deeper integration into internal data sources.

articles.title: Refreshed Mazda CX-60 rides high on refinement
articles.author: Phuti Mpyane
articles.summary: Mazda launched the updated 2025 CX-60 range with enhancements to drivability and comfort. The range includes the 2.5 l four-cylinder Dynamic, the 2.5 l four-cylinder all-wheel drive (AWD) Individual, and the 3.3D Takumi. The updated model features softer springs, revised dampers, recalibrated all-wheel-drive system software, and a reduction in noise, vehicle and harshness levels.

articles.title: Portable Compatibility: Apps & Devices Work Together!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Microsoft and ROG (Asus) are launching the ROG Xbox Ally handheld device, accompanied by a portable compatibility program. This program aims to optimize Xbox games for the ROG Xbox Ally and other portable devices, offering players a seamless gaming experience across multiple platforms through Xbox Game Pass and the 'Play Anywhere' initiative. The ROG Xbox Ally launch date is set to October 16th.

articles.title: ₹1.3 லட்சத்தில் இப்படி ஒரு பைக்கா? வாடிக்கையாளர்களை வியப்பில் ஆழ்த்தும் Bajaj!

articles.summary: Justin Bieber, through his brand SKYLRK, is teasing a new concept bench. The Instagram post showcases the first prototype of a wooden bench designed with a wavelike pattern, similar to the SKYLRK branding. Bieber has not yet confirmed if the bench will be available for sale.

articles.title: 27 Versatile Closet Staples From J.Crew Factory
articles.author: Lesley Chen
articles.summary: A variety of clothing items are described, including a gauze button-up shirt priced at $39.50+, classic crewneck tees from $16.95+, and high-waisted pants at $59.95+. Other items include pointelle tops, chino shorts, blazers, striped tees, mules, denim jackets, wraps, wide-leg jeans, maxi dresses, lightweight sweaters, pleated skirts, sweater vests, v-neck hoodies, mary jane flats, tank tops, mixed material dresses, wide-leg pants, chambray shirts, espadrille wedges, cardigans, ruffled blouses, straight-leg jeans, graphic tees, and cotton sweaters, each available in a range of sizes and colors, indicating product launches or introductions.

articles.title: Why ChatGPT-5 Fell Short and What It Means for You
articles.author: Finance Magnates
articles.summary: ChatGPT-5, an AI product, was launched on August 7 and generated significant initial excitement. However, this enthusiasm faded quickly. The article discusses reasons for the disappointment surrounding the launched product.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 series: All you need to know about specs, features and AI upgrades
articles.author: Tarun Verma
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 10 series, featuring the Pixel 10, 10 Pro, 10 Pro XL, and the flagship Pixel 10 Pro Fold. The Pixel 10 series include Tensor G5 for faster performance, advanced AI tools, powerful cameras, and long-lasting batteries. The Pixel 10 Pro Fold marks Google's entry into the foldable smartphone market.

articles.author: Iqbal
articles.summary: SanDisk's Extreme Portable SSD delivers up to 1050MB/s read speeds with IP65 water and dust resistance. The Samsung T7 portable SSD offers shock-resistant design with AES 256-bit hardware encryption. The Transcend 310C portable SSD provides dual USB Type-C and Type-A ports ensuring compatibility with laptops, desktops, iPads, and iPhones.

articles.title: GPT-5 is terrible and that's a good thing
articles.author: Lewis
articles.summary: OpenAI launched GPT-5 with updated features such as an 'agentic operator' and consolidated reasoning-language models. User reception has been mixed, with some finding it less capable than previous versions. Lovable, the vibe coding tool, reached $100 million in recurring revenue eight months after passing $1 million.

articles.title: 29 Amazon Gems You Didn't Know You Needed

articles.summary: Nyx is launching "Smushy" matte lip balm with rice powder and sugar ceramides, offering soft matte finish and flavors like cherry pie. Sol de Janeiro introduces "Sundays in Rio" mist, capturing an autumn day's essence with amber vanilla. Tocobo's glazed lip balm contains PHA for hydration and a glossy finish. The Honey Pot releases coconut shea body wash with lactic acid for sensitive skin. LifeStraw offers a collapsible filtered water bottle. McCormick's Potato Topping Seasoning brings flavor to potatoes and other dishes. The Drop introduces a lightweight and packable trench coat.

articles.author: Dean Blake

The entire Pixel line-up is available for pre-order on Google's online store, with a release date set for August 28, 2025. The new phones feature Google's Tensor G5 chip and enhanced AI capabilities.

articles.title: Psst, Thirtysomethings: If You Don't Have Any Of These 27 Things, You May Want 'Em
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff is launching a new 'Sqeezy' set, combining its cleaning paste with a cleaning sponge for effective grease and mildew removal. Gold Bond is introducing a neck and chest firming cream with salicylic acid, glycerin, and aloe, promising plumper and tighter skin in as little as a week. Levi's is offering pull-on skinny jeans with stretchy fabric for a comfortable fit, boasting high ratings.

articles.summary: Mrs. Meyer's introduces Tomato Vine–scented hand soap as a budget-friendly alternative to Loewe's Tomato Leaves soap. Twinings launches Strawberry Raspberry Refreshers, a caffeine-free instant tea, as a substitute for Starbucks' Pink Drink. Eos launches Marshmallow "Super Balm" lip treatment, and reviewers claim its superiority to Carmex and Summer Fridays. Fine'ry launches Pistachio Please body spray as an alternative to Sol de Janeiro 62 scent.

articles.title: CJ membership app to evolve into community-based platform
articles.author: Nam Hyun-Woo
articles.summary: CJ ONE, a membership app with over 31 million members, is undergoing a major renewal to enhance user experience and member benefits. The update introduces a community function for information exchange, a 'Point Seeds' reward system convertible to CJ ONE points, and an improved app interface. CJ ONE plans to launch the redesigned app in November after beta testing.

articles.title: 32 Personal Care Products Under $10 That Reviewers Can't Get Enough Of

articles.summary: Eos introduces the Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion, praised for its moisturizing properties and scent. articles.title: LG UNVEILS AI-DRIVEN, ENERGY-EFFICIENT LAUNDRY SOLUTIONS AT IFA 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching a new lineup of AI-powered laundry solutions in Europe, including the LG HeatPump WasherDryer (LG WashCombo). The new HeatPump WasherDryer delivers Energy Class A performance across the entire cycle and features DUAL Inverter HeatPump™ technology. The new washers also feature the Microplastic Care Cycle, which reduces up to 60 percent of microplastics released from synthetic fibers during washing.

articles.author: The Advocate
articles.summary: Hampr, an on-demand laundry service platform, received a $500,000 investment from the Louisiana Growth Fund. This investment will likely be used to expand or improve Hampr's services.

articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co. launched a new product or service on Thursday.

articles.title: Rog Xbox Ally and Rog Xbox Ally X: Unveiling the Official Launch Dates
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Asus is launching the ROG Xbox Ally and the more powerful ROG Xbox Ally X on October 16, 2025. The ROG Xbox Ally, targeting casual gamers, is estimated to cost between $550 and $650, while the ROG Xbox Ally X, designed for enthusiasts, is expected to range from $800 to $1,000.

articles.title: If You're Tired Of TikTok Products, I'm Sorry To Tell You That These 32 Products Are Actually Worth Every Penny

articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. E.l.f launched Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara for thin lashes. Kuumba Made released a Creamy Coconut fragrance rollerball. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder to absorb oil and blur pores. Catrice released "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener in four shades.

org: LaiLAC, Lotte AI Lab Alliances & Creators
articles.summary: Lotte Distribution Group is introducing 'Ageptic AI,' an AI system aimed at enhancing shopping experiences through personalized product recommendations, automating management tasks, optimizing inventory, and improving overall operational efficiency. By 2030, Lotte plans to integrate 'Ageptic AI' into a company-wide platform, forming partnerships to automate core functions like HR and marketing.

articles.title: First Pet Central Revolutionizes Pet Care with Innovative Product Line and Eco-Friendly Solutions
articles.author: Get News

articles.title: This Tiny, Crowdfunded Smartphone Promises Free Internet Access For AI Tools
articles.author: Joshua Hawkins
articles.summary: iKKO is launching the MindOne, a small, AI-powered smartphone, via Kickstarter. The MindOne features Android 15, iKKO AI OS, free global internet access for AI services, a 4.02-inch AMOLED display, and a flippable 50MP Sony camera. The MindOne Pro, exclusively on Kickstarter, includes a Sapphire Glass screen and free global internet for AI services, while the base MindOne sells for $389, and the MindOne Pro will cost $499.

articles.summary: Youdao, the online education arm of NetEase, has launched several AI-driven products, including the Youdao AI answering pen Space X, an upgraded Youdao Dictionary, and a new audio-video translation platform. The translation platform offers an end-to-end service aimed at international users, covering recording, speech recognition, translation, and dubbing.
